title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 226 - Gas Meters And Accessories-testing And Reporting
content:

State Regulations
§ 226.1 - General provisions
§ 226.2 - Definitions
§ 226.3 - Gas meter and accessory requirements-general
§ 226.4 - Testing facilities-general
§ 226.5 - Test-standards
§ 226.6 - Gas meters and accessories-test flow rates, out-test accuracy standards and test requirements
§ 226.7 - Gas meters-customer installations
§ 226.8 - Domestic meters-in-test programs
§ 226.9 - Large volume meters-in-test programs
§ 226.10 - Orifice meters-general conditions and accuracy maintenance requirements
§ 226.11 - Fixed pressure factor measurement installations-general conditions and installation and accuracy maintenance requirements
§ 226.12 - Periodic reports and records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 226

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §§
66[1], [3], and 67[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
